## Checklist

**For new safety documents:**
- [ ] All template sections completed
- [ ] Placeholder text replaced with actual content
- [ ] Risk ratings calculated correctly
- [ ] Emergency procedures clearly defined
- [ ] Related documents linked
- [ ] Review date set
- [ ] Metadata complete (reference, version, dates)
- [ ] Document added to index page (if approved)

**For document updates:**
- [ ] Version number incremented
- [ ] Changes clearly documented
- [ ] All affected sections updated
- [ ] Related documents updated (if needed)
- [ ] Review date updated

**For website changes:**
- [ ] Code follows existing style
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Print layout tested
- [ ] Accessibility checked
- [ ] Links verified
- [ ] CSS validated

**General:**
- [ ] Changes comply with safety standards
- [ ] No sensitive information exposed
- [ ] Commit messages are clear
- [ ] Branch is up to date with main
